mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL, LPAD(' ', 2*LEVEL-1) || SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(b.item_name, '/') PATH, bom_code, b.item_name, a.item_code, a.ing_code, a.item_type, level_type, bom_level, a.pro_code, c.pro_name, a.item_type, a.unit, a.item_con, a.pro_order FROM bom a left outer join itemlist b on a.ing_code = b.item_code left outer join process c on a.pro_code = c.pro_code START WITH a.ing_code = #{itemCode} CONNECT BY PRIOR a.bom_level = a.level_type ORDER SIBLINGS BY a.level_type
mapper.insert: insert into bom (bom_code, bom_level, ing_code, item_con, unit, pro_order, pro_code, level_type, item_code, item_type) values( (select NVL(MAX(bom_code),0)+1 from bom)+1, #{bomLevel}, #{ingCode}, #{itemCon}, #{unit}, #{proOrder}, #{proCode}, #{levelType}, #{itemCode}, #{itemType})
mapper.update: update bom set BOM_LEVEL = #{bomLevel}, ITEM_CON = #{itemCon}, UNIT = #{unit}, ITEM_TYPE = #{itemType}, PRO_CODE = #{proCode}, LEVEL_TYPE = #{levelType}, ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}, ING_CODE = #{ingCode}, PRO_ORDER = #{proOrder} where bom_code = #{bomCode}
mapper.select: select bom_code, bom_level, a.ing_code, b.item_name, a.item_type, a.unit, a.item_con, a.pro_order, c.pro_code, c.pro_name, level_type FROM bom a left outer join itemlist b on a.ing_code = b.item_code left outer join process c on a.pro_code = c.pro_code where a.item_code = #{itemCode} order by a.bom_code

SELECT distinct LEVEL, LPAD(' ', 2*LEVEL-1) || SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(b.item_name, '/') PATH, b.item_name, a.ing_code, a.item_type, a.pro_code, c.pro_name, a.unit, a.pro_order FROM bom a left outer join itemlist b on a.ing_code = b.item_code left outer join process c on a.pro_code = c.pro_code START WITH a.ing_code = #{itemCode} CONNECT BY PRIOR a.bom_level = a.level_type order by level, pro_order
